11#include "pc/dtmf_sender.h"
12
13#include <ctype.h>
14#include <string.h>
15
16#include <string>
17
18#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
19#include "rtc_base/logging.h"
20#include "rtc_base/ref_counted_object.h"
21#include "rtc_base/task_utils/to_queued_task.h"
22#include "rtc_base/thread.h"
23
24namespace webrtc {
25
26// RFC4733
27// +-------+--------+------+---------+
28// | Event | Code | Type | Volume? |
29// +-------+--------+------+---------+
30// | 0--9 | 0--9 | tone | yes |
31// | * | 10 | tone | yes |
32// | # | 11 | tone | yes |
33// | A--D | 12--15 | tone | yes |
34// +-------+--------+------+---------+
35// The "," is a special event defined by the WebRTC spec. It means to delay for
36// 2 seconds before processing the next tone. We use -1 as its code.
37static const int kDtmfCommaDelay = -1;
38static const char kDtmfValidTones[] = ",0123456789*#ABCDabcd";
39static const char kDtmfTonesTable[] = ",0123456789*#ABCD";
40// The duration cannot be more than 6000ms or less than 40ms. The gap between
41// tones must be at least 50 ms.
42// Source for values: W3C WEBRTC specification.
43// https://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc/#dom-rtcdtmfsender-insertdtmf
44static const int kDtmfDefaultDurationMs = 100;
45static const int kDtmfMinDurationMs = 40;
46static const int kDtmfMaxDurationMs = 6000;
47static const int kDtmfDefaultGapMs = 50;
48static const int kDtmfMinGapMs = 30;
49
50// Get DTMF code from the DTMF event character.
51bool GetDtmfCode(char tone, int* code) {
52 // Convert a-d to A-D.
53 char event = toupper(tone);
54 const char* p = strchr(kDtmfTonesTable, event);
55 if (!p) {
56 return false;
57 }
58 *code = p - kDtmfTonesTable - 1;
59 return true;
60}
61
62rtc::scoped_refptr<DtmfSender> DtmfSender::Create(
63 rtc::Thread* signaling_thread,
64 DtmfProviderInterface* provider) {
65 if (!signaling_thread) {
66 return nullptr;
67 }
68 return rtc::make_ref_counted<DtmfSender>(signaling_thread, provider);
69}
70
71DtmfSender::DtmfSender(rtc::Thread* signaling_thread,
72 DtmfProviderInterface* provider)
73 : observer_(nullptr),
74 signaling_thread_(signaling_thread),
75 provider_(provider),
76 duration_(kDtmfDefaultDurationMs),
77 inter_tone_gap_(kDtmfDefaultGapMs),
78 comma_delay_(kDtmfDefaultCommaDelayMs) {
79 RTC_DCHECK(signaling_thread_);
80 if (provider_) {
81 RTC_DCHECK(provider_->GetOnDestroyedSignal());
82 provider_->GetOnDestroyedSignal()->connect(
83 this, &DtmfSender::OnProviderDestroyed);
84 }
85}
86
87DtmfSender::~DtmfSender() {
88 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
89 StopSending();
90}
91
92void DtmfSender::RegisterObserver(DtmfSenderObserverInterface* observer) {
93 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
94 observer_ = observer;
95}
96
97void DtmfSender::UnregisterObserver() {
98 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
99 observer_ = nullptr;
100}
101
102bool DtmfSender::CanInsertDtmf() {
103 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
104 if (!provider_) {
105 return false;
106 }
107 return provider_->CanInsertDtmf();
108}
109
110bool DtmfSender::InsertDtmf(const std::string& tones,
111 int duration,
112 int inter_tone_gap,
113 int comma_delay) {
114 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
115
116 if (duration > kDtmfMaxDurationMs || duration < kDtmfMinDurationMs ||
117 inter_tone_gap < kDtmfMinGapMs || comma_delay < kDtmfMinGapMs) {
118 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR)
119 << "InsertDtmf is called with invalid duration or tones gap. "
120 "The duration cannot be more than "
121 << kDtmfMaxDurationMs << "ms or less than " << kDtmfMinDurationMs
122 << "ms. The gap between tones must be at least " << kDtmfMinGapMs
123 << "ms.";
124 return false;
125 }
126
127 if (!CanInsertDtmf()) {
128 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR)
129 << "InsertDtmf is called on DtmfSender that can't send DTMF.";
130 return false;
131 }
132
133 tones_ = tones;
134 duration_ = duration;
135 inter_tone_gap_ = inter_tone_gap;
136 comma_delay_ = comma_delay;
137
138 // Cancel any remaining tasks for previous tones.
139 if (safety_flag_) {
140 safety_flag_->SetNotAlive();
141 }
142 safety_flag_ = PendingTaskSafetyFlag::Create();
143 // Kick off a new DTMF task.
144 QueueInsertDtmf(RTC_FROM_HERE, 1 /*ms*/);
145 return true;
146}
147
148std::string DtmfSender::tones() const {
149 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
150 return tones_;
151}
152
153int DtmfSender::duration() const {
154 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
155 return duration_;
156}
157
158int DtmfSender::inter_tone_gap() const {
159 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
160 return inter_tone_gap_;
161}
162
163int DtmfSender::comma_delay() const {
164 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
165 return comma_delay_;
166}
167
168void DtmfSender::QueueInsertDtmf(const rtc::Location& posted_from,
169 uint32_t delay_ms) {
170 signaling_thread_->PostDelayedTask(
171 ToQueuedTask(safety_flag_,
172 [this] {
173 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
174 DoInsertDtmf();
175 }),
176 delay_ms);
177}
178
179void DtmfSender::DoInsertDtmf() {
180 // Get the first DTMF tone from the tone buffer. Unrecognized characters will
181 // be ignored and skipped.
182 size_t first_tone_pos = tones_.find_first_of(kDtmfValidTones);
183 int code = 0;
184 if (first_tone_pos == std::string::npos) {
185 tones_.clear();
186 // Fire a OnToneChange event with an empty string and stop.
187 if (observer_) {
188 observer_->OnToneChange(std::string(), tones_);
189 observer_->OnToneChange(std::string());
190 }
191 return;
192 } else {
193 char tone = tones_[first_tone_pos];
194 if (!GetDtmfCode(tone, &code)) {
195 // The find_first_of(kDtmfValidTones) should have guarantee |tone| is
196 // a valid DTMF tone.
197 RTC_NOTREACHED();
198 }
199 }
200
201 int tone_gap = inter_tone_gap_;
202 if (code == kDtmfCommaDelay) {
203 // Special case defined by WebRTC - By default, the character ',' indicates
204 // a delay of 2 seconds before processing the next character in the tones
205 // parameter. The comma delay can be set to a non default value via
206 // InsertDtmf to comply with legacy WebRTC clients.
207 tone_gap = comma_delay_;
208 } else {
209 if (!provider_) {
210 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "The DtmfProvider has been destroyed.";
211 return;
212 }
213 // The provider starts playout of the given tone on the
214 // associated RTP media stream, using the appropriate codec.
215 if (!provider_->InsertDtmf(code, duration_)) {
216 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "The DtmfProvider can no longer send DTMF.";
217 return;
218 }
219 // Wait for the number of milliseconds specified by |duration_|.
220 tone_gap += duration_;
221 }
222
223 // Fire a OnToneChange event with the tone that's just processed.
224 if (observer_) {
225 observer_->OnToneChange(tones_.substr(first_tone_pos, 1),
226 tones_.substr(first_tone_pos + 1));
227 observer_->OnToneChange(tones_.substr(first_tone_pos, 1));
228 }
229
230 // Erase the unrecognized characters plus the tone that's just processed.
231 tones_.erase(0, first_tone_pos + 1);
232
233 // Continue with the next tone.
234 QueueInsertDtmf(RTC_FROM_HERE, tone_gap);
235}
236
237void DtmfSender::OnProviderDestroyed() {
238 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(signaling_thread_);
239
240 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "The Dtmf provider is deleted. Clear the sending queue.";
241 StopSending();
242 provider_ = nullptr;
243}
244
245void DtmfSender::StopSending() {
246 if (safety_flag_) {
247 safety_flag_->SetNotAlive();
248 }
249}
250
251} // namespace webrtc
